content: with this crochet pattern you can make your own cute little amigurumi bunny size 9 5 cm 3 2/4 from head to toe 13 cm 5 including ears when crocheted with dk / light worsted weight yarn and a 2 50 mm crochet hook difficulty 3 intermediate includes some less common crochet techniques small details and simple shaping skills required * crocheting in spiral 1 * chain slip and single_crochet stitch * increasing 2 and decreasing 3 you will need * dk / light worsted / # 3 / sport weight yarn - for the brown bunny i used alize alpaca royal a dk weight alpaca wool and acrylic blend 250 m 273 yd / 100 g you will need about 17 g of brown yarn 558 mushroom - for the beige bunny i used katia linen a dk weight cotton and linen blend 112 m 122 yd / 50 g you will need about 17 g of beige yarn 07 light beige * 2 50 - 3 00 mm crochet hook us size 2/c - 3/d * polyester fiberfill wool etc for stuffing * 6 mm 1/4 safety eyes or buttons beads felt etc * dark brown cotton embroidery floss * yarn needle scissors stitch marker for the fuzzy version you will need * fuzzy baby yarn i used alize softy you will need about 23 g of beige yarn 310 honey * 2 75 mm crochet hook * polyester fiberfill wool etc for stuffing * 8 mm 1/3 safety eyes or buttons beads felt etc * dark brown cotton embroidery floss * yarn needle scissors stitch marker copyright © 2014 kristi tullus tü spire all rights reserved you may not sell copy reproduce alter publish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell finished items made with any of my patterns 1 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/123118727-crocheting-in-spiral 2 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/124607495-increasing 3 https //kristitullus com/blogs/news/125738439-decreasing
